Key Match Events: Jameson Taillon pitched six strong innings to help beat Gerrit Cole and the Yankees, 2-1.
Pre-Game Insights: Taillon and Gerrit Cole were teammates and friends in the past.
Taillon praised Cole as a future Hall of Famer and a great pitcher.
Post-Match Reflections: The Cubs' hitting has been poor recently but the pitching has been sharp.
Isaac Paredes snapped an 0-for-14 skid with a hit.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kerry Wood and Aramis Ram√≠rez were inducted into the Cubs Hall of Fame.
The Cubs' pitching held the Yankees to six runs.
